name: ConceptsOnRails
tag_list: ruby-on-rails, innovation, concepting, prototyping, web-development, venture-funding, growth, user-feedback, mobile-development, phonegap, titanium-mobile, appcelerator, success, technology-showcase, startup-services, agile-development, startups, fast-pro
overview:
Web development for innovators.

Whether you are a startup, an established organization or an individual requiring technical support ConceptsOnRails is for you.

For Startups: We can create a proof of concept of your killer idea to help you clarifying requirements, features, demo it to get funded and get user feedback.

Established organizations: If your organization needs to show new technologies at events, or ideas to potential customers. Lets create the Web applications to showcase those new technologies.

For individuals: Will your cool idea become the new Facebook, Twitter or YouTube! There is only one way to find out. Lets create a version of the concept so real users can try it out.
